metadata.title: Visions & Reflections The SARS-CoV S glycoprotein

abstract.original_text: The severe acute respiratory syndrome-coronavirus (SARS-CoV) spike (S) glycoprotein alone can mediate the membrane fusion required for virus entry and cell fusion. It is also a major immunogen and a target for CMLS Cellular and Molecular Life Sciences entry inhibitors. Recent rapid advances in our knowledge of the structure and function of this protein have lead to the development of a number of candidate vaccine immunogens and SARS-CoV entry inhibitors.

sentences.segment_text: The severe acute respiratory syndrome-coronavirus ( SARS-CoV ) spike ( S ) glycoprotein alone can mediate the membrane fusion required for virus entry and cell fusion .
It is also a major immunogen and a target for CMLS Cellular and Molecular Life Sciences entry inhibitors .
Recent rapid advances in our knowledge of the structure and function of this protein have lead to the development of a number of candidate vaccine immunogens and SARS-CoV entry inhibitors .
